localised_text.tooltip_text: You can copy the context key and use it with a ContextInitLookup callback to create test layouts that work with this context (so if you want to attach a bit of debug UI to a particular character that follows them around and shows their health for example)
If DaVe open, will select table and record in DaVE

is_live_checkbox.componentleveltooltip: If enabled continuosly updates the component view so that you always have an up to date view of the component tree, may be disabled if viewing a ton of components at once (like at top level of world).

newstate.name: NewState
newstate.text: Context Viewer An all powerful dev tool

newstate.name: NewState
newstate.text: Mouse over image to see at source size

newstate.name: NewState
newstate.text: Test context expressions here (use ~ for console cmds)

button_refresh.componentleveltooltip: Refresh information for context. Only really needed for functions that return context objects or context lists, basic values will update constantly on their own.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: (context = Component("context_viewer").CurrentSelectedContext) => GetIf( IsOfType(context, "CcoComponent"), CcoRTExpander( TargetComponent: context, IsSearch: false, CloseOthers: false) )

(context = Component("context_viewer").CurrentSelectedContext, is_searching = Component("context_viewer").IsSearchActive) => CcoRTExpander( TargetComponent: context, IsSearch: is_searching, CloseOthers: false)

live_update_tree_holder.componentleveltooltip: If enabled continuosly updates the component view so that you always have an up to date view of the component tree, may be disabled if viewing a ton of components at once (like at top level of world).

is_live_label.componentleveltooltip: If enabled continuosly updates the component view so that you always have an up to date view of the component tree, may be disabled if viewing a ton of components at once (like at top level of world).

callback_with_context.context_function_id: UiMsg(Format("ContextViewerComponentTreeSearchChanged%S", "")) # this %S is here is because it asserts otherwise.. soorryy!

close_all_button.componentleveltooltip: Collapse the tree to the root component

open_in_uied.componentleveltooltip: If UiEd is open, this will open the layout the selected component is in and select it.

button_help.componentleveltooltip: Opens up some relevant documentation about the context viewer and contexts in your default applications (external window)
